CHAT.comment: FRANCHISE TAX BOARD OF CALIFORNIA, Petitioner, v. GILBERT P. HYATT, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF FELIX LEATHERWOOD ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF H. BARTOW FARR ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF FELIX LEATHERWOOD ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:59 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
